item.title: 美国股市落后于全球股市，预示着股市将迎来艰难的一年
item.description: 2025 年初，全球股市大胜美国股市，这是一个不祥的历史信号，预示着美国投资者今年余下时间的走势。【原文：Equity markets around the world are trouncing US stocks in early 2025, an ominous historical signal for how the rest of the year could shape up for US investors.】

item.title: 奥地利在经济衰退和极右翼势力阴影下组建新内阁
item.description: 大选结束五个多月后，奥地利任命了一个由保守派领导的政府，负责使经济走出衰退，同时削减预算赤字，扭转右翼民粹主义抬头的趋势。【原文：More than five months after elections, Austria appointed a conservative-led government entrusted with pulling the economy out of recession while cutting the budget deficit and reversing a surge in right-wing populism.】

item.title: 欧洲央行进入最后削减阶段，欧元区通胀降温
item.description: 在欧洲中央银行进入最后一轮降息之际，欧元区通胀有所放缓，增强了人们对通胀接近 2% 目标的信心。【原文：Euro-area inflation eased, boosting confidence that it’s approaching the 2% target as the European Central Bank enters the last leg of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 墨西哥的明星经济梦想在唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁下破灭
item.description: 就在几年前，制造商们还在为搬迁到墨西哥东北部的工业城市蒙特雷而争夺空间，因为他们希望搬到离美国及其庞大的消费市场更近的地方。如今，房地产商提供了灵活的租赁计划，以便将企业留在该地区。【原文：Only a couple years ago, manufacturers were fighting for space to relocate their operations to Monterrey, an industrial city in Mexico’s northeast, as they sought to move closer to the US and its vast consumer market. These days, real estate agents are offering flexible rental plans to keep businesses in the area.】

item.title: 风险警惕型交易员抛售赢家，大型科技公司痛苦加剧
item.description: 一段时间以来，人们有很多理由担心大型科技股。大幅上涨后的估值捉襟见肘、人工智能方面的巨额支出以及对未来增长的高预期。但几个月来，这些似乎都不重要。【原文：For some time now, there have been plenty of reasons to worry about Big Tech stocks. Stretched valuations after a big run up, heavy spending on artificial intelligence and lofty expectations for future growth. For months, though, none of it seemed to matter.】

item.description: 据印尼金融监管部门称，印尼金融服务管理局正在与经纪人和基金经理举行会议，讨论近期的市场状况。【原文：Indonesia’s Financial Services Authority is holding a meeting with brokers and fund managers to discuss recent market conditions, according to the financial regulator.】

item.title: 国防承诺波及全球，债券收益率上升
item.description: 周一，在欧洲领导人齐聚一堂支持乌克兰并讨论改善欧洲大陆安全措施之后，债券收益率上升，促使投资者为国防开支激增做好准备。【原文：Bond yields rose on Monday after European leaders gathered to support Ukraine and discuss improved security measures for the continent, prompting investors to prepare for a surge in defense spending.】

item.description: 由于美国和欧洲在和平进程问题上的分歧动摇了投资者对有序实现停火的预期，乌克兰的美元债券创下了自去年重组以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Ukraine’s dollar bonds slid the most since last year’s restructuring as divisions between the US and Europe on the peace process shook investors expecting an orderly move toward a ceasefire.】

item.title: 碧桂园再次聘请 Houlihan 和 CICC 担任财务顾问
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，碧桂园控股有限公司已再次聘请华利安公司和中国国际金融有限公司担任其离岸债务重组的财务顾问，在其寻求债权人支持其债务计划之际，碧桂园再次与这两家公司建立联系。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. has again engaged Houlihan Lokey Inc. and China International Capital Corp. as financial advisers on its offshore debt restructuring, according to people familiar with the matter, renewing ties with the two firms as it seeks to build creditor support for its debt plan.】

And, with the Trump administration recently proposing a budget that would see US debt levels swell even further, it doesn’t look like this issue is going away any time soon. In this episode, we speak with Ray Dalio, the billionaire founder of the hedge fund Bridgewater Associates and the author of the new book, How Countries Go Broke. We talk about how he thinks about debt cycles, the catalyst for when high levels of debt become an i】

item.title: 南非工厂因特朗普和贸易担忧而情绪低落
item.description: 由于对全球贸易的担忧、美国与比勒陀利亚的争执以及停电现象的再次出现，2 月份南非工厂的景气度进一步陷入收缩区间，连续第五个月下降。【原文：South African factory sentiment edged deeper into contractionary territory in February, declining for a fifth month amid concern about global trade, a US spat with Pretoria and the return of power cuts.】

item.title: 北极天气模式可能导致欧洲春季寒冷开始
item.description: 欧洲本月将面临寒流侵袭，预报员们正准备应对来自北极的异常天气事件，这可能会在春季来临之际增加供暖需求。【原文：Europe faces a cold snap this month as forecasters brace for an unusual weather event originating in the Arctic, threatening to bolster heating demand just as spring gets underway.】

item.title: 丰田发放股东福利吸引散户投资者
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp. ）将首次向投资者发放福利，包括数字积分和参加赛车活动门票抽奖的机会，成为近几个月来宣布股东福利计划的最新一家日本公司。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. will for the first time hand out perks to entice investors, including digital credits and a chance to enter a draw for motorsport event tickets, becoming the latest Japanese firm to announce shareholder benefit programs in recent months.】

item.title: 关税担忧升级，亚洲货币再次面临逆风
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对中国征收新关税后，新兴亚洲货币的前景再次恶化，这抑制了人们对其威胁主要是讨价还价伎俩的乐观情绪。【原文：The outlook for emerging Asian currencies is worsening again after US President Donald Trump announced new tariffs on China, curbing optimism that his threats were mainly bargaining ploys.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克债务主管认为存在预算风险，乌克兰使收益率居高不下
item.description: 斯洛伐克债务管理负责人表示，在政府控制预算赤字和邻国乌克兰的战争结束之前，斯洛伐克可能会面临借贷成本上升的问题。【原文：Slovakia is likely to face elevated borrowing costs until the government reins in the budget deficit and the war in neighboring Ukraine comes to an end, according to the country’s debt management chief.】

item.title: 中国政策会议前削减钢铁产量导致铁矿石下跌
item.description: 铁矿石自 1 月中旬以来首次跌破每吨 100 美元，原因是一些钢厂削减了产量，以确保即将在北京召开的政府政策会议期间能有蓝天白云。【原文：Iron ore slumped below $100 a ton for the first time since mid-January as some steel mills curbed production to ensure blue skies during the government’s upcoming policy meetings in Beijing, where overcapacity in the industry is also likely to be a topic for discussion.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司巴什科尔托斯坦乌法炼油厂发生火灾
item.description: 俄罗斯石油股份公司（Rosneft PJSC）位于俄罗斯巴什科尔托斯坦共和国的乌法炼油厂周一早发生火灾。【原文：A fire broke out at Rosneft PJSC’s Ufa refinery in the Russian republic of Bashkortostan early Monday.】

item.title: 瑞典 Alecta 旗舰 Optimal 基金回报率下降
item.description: 2024 年，瑞典养老金集团 Alecta 旗舰基金的全年回报率下降了近两个百分点，原因是其固定收益和另类资产投资组合表现相对不佳。【原文：Swedish pension group Alecta saw full-year returns at its flagship fund decline by nearly two percentage points in 2024, weighed down by the relative underperformance of its fixed income and alternative asset portfolios.】

item.title: 乌克兰谈判前景黯淡，欧洲天然气价格飙升
item.description: 美国和乌克兰领导人周五发生争执后，欧洲天然气跳涨，使最近与俄罗斯就结束战争达成协议的努力受到质疑。【原文：European natural gas jumped after US and Ukrainian leaders sparred on Friday, throwing into doubt recent efforts to reach a deal with Russia on ending the war.】

item.title: 欧洲领导人表示支持乌克兰，欧洲国防类股大涨

item.title: 瑞士房贷基准降至 2023 年水平，房租面临削减
